Articles.Content:
As the title says, right now these parts are cosmetic, since drag seems to apply to parts within, with a vengeance. Sometimes it feels like the souposphere of old KSP1 is in full effect, in fact.

Just a quick report of the thing I'm most sure I know what's going on with. Plenty of other bugs, but also plenty of fun, and plenty of wishing I had a beefier PC. In other words, so far KSP 2 reminds me a lot about KSP 1 in the not-so-early days of development.

 

Rune. I think that's a good thing! Also, hello everyone again.

Edited February 26, 2023 by Rune
